name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence featuring an intro video highlighting Tokino Sora's career milestones and concert details.
Tokino Sora appears on stage and performs the song 'Dreaming!'.

subtitles.original: 2026.01.10 Tokyo International Forum
subtitles.english: January 10, 2026 Tokyo International Forum

subtitles.original: 1st year 2019
subtitles.english: 1st year 2019

subtitles.english: 4th year 2022

subtitles.original: 5th year 2023
subtitles.english: 5th year 2023

subtitles.original: 6th year 2024
subtitles.english: 6th year 2024

subtitles.original: 8th year 2025
subtitles.english: 8th year 2025

subtitles.original: with DJ ANKIMO
subtitles.english: with DJ ANKIMO

subtitles.original: Are You Ready?
subtitles.english: Are You Ready?

subtitles.original: Dreams in Motion New Year's Party 2026
subtitles.english: Dreams in Motion New Year's Party 2026

subtitles.original: 未完成の地図を輝きに変えて
subtitles.english: Transforming the incomplete map into brilliance

subtitles.original: 誰にも真似できない足跡を見てて
subtitles.english: Watch these footprints that no one can imitate

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 走り出した願いは加速していく準備路
subtitles.english: The wishes that started running are on the accelerating path

subtitles.original: 目に映るものに戸惑いながら
subtitles.english: While being puzzled by the things I see

subtitles.original: 仮想世界だって私が見えてるんでしょ？
subtitles.english: Even if it's a virtual world, you can see me, right?

subtitles.original: 君だけにある世界が正解
subtitles.english: The world that exists only for you is the right answer

subtitles.original: ドキドキは泣き出したくもなるよ
subtitles.english: This heartbeat makes me want to start crying

subtitles.original: だけどドキドキがクレッシェンド鳴り止まないから
subtitles.english: But the pounding of my heart is a crescendo that won't stop

subtitles.original: 大きくなってだって君に届けたいよ
subtitles.english: Even as it grows bigger, I want to reach you

subtitles.original: 素顔になってだって未来を見に行こうよ
subtitles.english: Even by showing my true self, let's go see the future

subtitles.original: 明けない夜だって光のライヤーじゃなくて
subtitles.english: Even in a night that doesn't break, not with a liar's light

subtitles.original: 平気だよ一緒に笑いたいから
subtitles.english: It's okay, because I want to laugh together

subtitles.original: 綺麗になってだってちょっぴり自信持って
subtitles.english: Even by becoming beautiful, having a little confidence

subtitles.original: 目から目だってだってここで歌いたいの
subtitles.english: Eye to eye, I want to sing here

subtitles.original: いつもよりもちょっと大きな声でもっと
subtitles.english: With a voice a little louder than usual, more and more

subtitles.original: 自分信じて星型になろうね！
subtitles.english: Believe in yourself and let's become star-shaped!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: 声がちょっとちっちゃいかなー？
subtitles.english: Is your voice a little quiet?

subtitles.original: スポットライトもうちょっと当ててきて最高潮
subtitles.english: Shine the spotlight a little more, reaching the climax

subtitles.original: 不安も全部巻き込んでアガるステージ
subtitles.english: Involving all anxieties, the stage heats up

subtitles.original: 星となりだってこれが私のクロール
subtitles.english: Even as I become a star, this is my crawl

subtitles.original: 君だけに見せたいカラーの世界
subtitles.english: A world of color I want to show only to you

subtitles.original: みんな声出していけるかー！？
subtitles.english: Everyone, can you shout!?

subtitles.original: せーの！ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: ワッショイ！ワッショイ！ワッショイ！ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Wasshoi! Wasshoi! Wasshoi! Wasshoi!
